channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump has said Canada should be the 51st state. Today, he meets its prime minister
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney won the Canadian election vowing to take on President Trump. Tuesday, they meet for the first time in the Oval Office.

item.title: Meet the Florida group chipping away at public benefits one state at a time
item.description: The Trump administration's "Make America Healthy Again" platform has boosted the agenda of a conservative think tank that's been working for more than...

item.title: Trump expands military use at the southern border. Are there legal limits?
item.description: The Posse Comitatus Act restricts using federal troops in civilian law enforcement. Exceptions exist, but Trump's crackdown on immigration is shaping ...

item.title: Critics warn DOJ is being politicized despite vows to end its purported weaponization
item.description: Critics warn that despite President Trump's call to end the purported weaponization of the Justice Department, it has become more politicized in the p...

item.title: Twenty years later, the REAL ID deadline is here. Here's why it took so long
item.description: REAL ID will be enforced in U.S. airports starting May 7. Implementing the law involved years of negotiations between federal and state officials.

item.title: Germany's Merz falls short of majority in vote for chancellor
item.description: Conservative Friedrich Merz unexpectedly falls short of the numbers needed to become chancellor.

item.title: Crews searching for 10-year-old girl swept away by Texas floodwaters

item.title: How Kashmir attack victim's widow went from symbol of tragedy to trolling target
item.description: Himanshi Narwal's husband was among the victims of the deadly militant attack in Indian-administered Kashmir.

item.title: HIV testing and outreach falter as Trump funding cuts sweep the South
item.description: A disruption in federal funds has jeopardized HIV testing and outreach in Mississippi, and researchers warn of a resurgence of the epidemic in the Sou...

item.title: Peru imposes curfew in province where 13 mine workers were killed
item.description: A local prosecutor says there is a "war" raging in the area between illegal and legal gold miners.

item.title: 5/5: The Daily Report
item.description: Lindsey Reiser reports on President Trump's comments about due process and the constitution, jury selection in Sean "Diddy" Combs' sex trafficking and...

item.title: Hamas says 'no point' to truce talks as Israel plans to capture all of Gaza
item.description: The UN also expresses alarm after Israel approves a new plan that may include seizing all of Gaza indefinitely and controlling aid.

item.title: May 5: CBS News 24/7, 4pm ET
item.description: The Trump administration is offering some migrants free airline tickets, $1,000 stipends to self-deport; New parents face higher prices for baby produ...

item.title: Sudan paramilitaries escalate attacks on key city
item.description: Drones hit the civilian section of Port Sudan's airport, a fuel depot and a major hotel.

item.title: 5/5: America Decides
item.description: Trump to put 100% tariff on movies made outside U.S.; Twenty attorneys general sue Trump administration over HHS cuts

item.title: Boat believed to be carrying migrants capsizes off California coast, leaving 3 dead and 7 missing
